name: Fine Glassware
description: Exquisite Venetian glassware, renowned throughout Europe for its clarity and craftsmanship. Each piece showcases the mastery of Murano glassblowers.

historicalNotes.historicalSignificance: Venetian glassware became one of the Republic's most prestigious exports. The secrets of its production were closely guarded, with glassmakers confined to Murano island and forbidden from leaving the Republic.
